summary: So, Pinktober 2018 happened. On this second edition of my self-imposed Kirby themed Inktober challenge, I have created a second...
caption:
So, Pinktober 2018 happened. On this second edition of my self-imposed Kirby themed Inktober challenge, I have created a second Kirby poster! Here are just a few of the progress shots that you can find on my instagram or Twitter ;)

Follow me on:
twitter | instagram | facebook | deviantart

Hey! Likes boost my ego, but reblogs boost my ability to reach more people with my art! So if you like me, I appreciate it, but if you reblog, you’re actually helping!

reblog.comment:

tags: She's a doctor but she looks like a nurse
summary: "I only wanted to help others; I wanted to see happy faces. But greed overtook my mind. And before I knew it, I was...
body:
“I only wanted to help others; I wanted to see happy faces. But greed overtook my mind. And before I knew it, I was gone.”

~

Done with my take on Emily Dyer, the Doctor from Identity V!

reblog.comment:
